languages.text: Whenever an ally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, that ally also heals 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every stack granted.
languages.original_text: Повышая уровень Тактического преимущества {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g}, союзник восстанавливает себе 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} за каждый уровень.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an ally grants the Tactician stacks of Tactical Advantage, that ally also heals 1 Wound for every stack granted.
Whenever an ally grants the Tactician stacks of Tactical Advantage, that ally also heals 1 Wound for every stack granted.
Whenever an ally grants the Tactician stacks of Tactical Advantage, that ally also heals 1 wound for every stack granted.

Whenever an ally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} stacks of tactical advantage, that ally also heals 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every stack granted.

languages.text: Повышая уровень {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Тактического преимущества{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g}, союзник восстанавливает себе 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} за каждый уровень.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, that ally also heals 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every stack granted.

traits.locale_text: Повышая уровень {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Тактического преимущества{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g}, союзник восстанавливает себе 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} за каждый уровень.
Повышая уровень Тактического преимущества тактика, союзник восстанавливает себе 1 здоровье за каждый уровень.

languages.text: 每当盟友使{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}获得{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数时，战术专家每获得1层层数，便为该盟友恢复1点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, that ally also heals 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every stack granted.

traits.locale_text: 每当盟友使战术专家获得战术优势时，战术专家每获得1层层数，便为该盟友恢复1点生命值。

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado otorgue al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g}, ese aliado también se cura 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}herida{/g} por cada acumulación otorgada.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, that ally also heals 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every stack granted.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un aliado otorgue al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g} acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica, ese aliado también se cura 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}herida{/g} por cada acumulación otorgada.

languages.text: Wenn ein Verbündeter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} Stapel von {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Taktischer Vorteil{/g} gewährt, heilt dieser Verbündete für jeden Stapel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunde{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, that ally also heals 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every stack granted.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Verbündeter dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil gewährt, heilt dieser Verbündete für jeden Stapel 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunde{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un allié confère des cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} au {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, cet allié soigne également 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessure{/g} par cumul conféré.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, that ally also heals 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every stack granted.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un allié confère des cumuls d'Avantage Tactique au Tacticien, cet allié soigne également 1 blessure par cumul conféré.

languages.text: 味方が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}の戦術的優位のスタックを増やす時、その味方は増やした戦術的優位1スタックにつき{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を1回復する。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} stacks of tactical advantage, that ally also heals 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every stack granted.

traits.locale_text: 味方が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}の戦術的優位のスタックを増やす時、その味方は増やした戦術的優位1スタックにつき{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を1回復する。

languages.text: Bir dost birim, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g}'e her {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi kazandırdığında o dost birimin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlığı{/g} kazandırdığı her birikim için 1 puan tazelenir.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, that ally also heals 1 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wound{/g} for every stack granted.
